ai-patthana21.9:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, sometimes the top of the Dhamma is given to him:
ai-patthana21.9:0.3_0: being attached to their foes, profitable and calm,
ai-patthana21.9:1.1_0: Not regarding the unprofitable or unprofitable teaching, and skillful qualities arise because of a cause or reason.
ai-patthana21.9:2.1_0: Not regarding the unprofitable or unprofitable teaching, and unskillful qualities arise because of a cause or reason.
ai-patthana21.9:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.9:3.1_0: nor has caused the reason why sometimes it doesn’t arise in both ways: without answering.
ai-patthana21.9:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana21.9:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
